```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(mosaic)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(openxlsx)
library(stringr)
library(haven)
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(foreign)
library(plyr)
library(ggrepel)
```

```{r}
heightdatalong.xlsx <- read_xlsx("./heightdatalong.xlsx")
alldata.rds <- read_rds("./alldata.rds")
```

##PLots

```{r, warning=FALSE}
#xlsx plot
heightdatalong.xlsx %>%
  group_by(Country) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year_decade, y = height)) +
  geom_line(aes(group = Country)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Decades", y = "Height (inches)", title = "World Country Heights Estimates")
```



```{r, warning=FALSE}
#5 data sets plot
alldata.rds %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = height_cm, x = birth_century)) +
  geom_point() + 
  labs(x = "Century of Births", y = "Height (cm)", title = "Height Distribution Across Centuries") +
  theme_bw()
```
